HomePage.areaofworkp: We create meaningful cultural exchanges and sustainable partnerships across eight key areas.

overview.heading: 1. Overview
overview.text: We respect your privacy and comply with GDPR and relevant European regulations.

personalData.heading: 2. Personal Data We Collect
personalData.voluntary: Voluntary submission: names, emails, organization data, event registration details.
personalData.automatic: Automatic collection: IP address, device/browser type, site navigation patterns (via minimal, privacy-friendly analytics).

useOfInformation.heading: 3. Use of Information
useOfInformation.text: Your data helps us manage registrations, send updates, administer events, and improve our services.

cookies.heading: 4. Cookies & Analytics
cookies.text: We use essential cookies for functionality and may deploy privacy-focused analytics to understand usage trends without compromising anonymity.

dataSharing.heading: 5. Data Sharing & Transfers
dataSharing.text: We do not sell your data. We may share it with service providers (hosting, analytics, communications), but only under GDPR-compliant agreements. Data doesn’t leave the EEA unless strictly necessary and legally permissible.

dataRetention.heading: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We keep personal data only as long as needed—for legitimate purposes, legal obligations, or until withdrawal of consent. After that, data is securely deleted or anonymized.

gdprRights.heading: 7. Your Rights Under GDPR
rightsList: Erase your data ("right to be forgotten")
gdprRights.footer: Submit such requests via the website's contact mechanism.

security.heading: 8. Security Measures
security.text: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data—encryption, access controls, and regular reviews.

policyUpdates.heading: 9. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.text: We may update this policy. The latest version will always be available on the site, and significant changes may be communicated via email or site announcements.

contact.heading: 10. Contact
contact.text: For any privacy concerns or requests, reach out via our website’s contact form or the email provided on the site.

Footer.brandDesc: Bridging cultures, fostering understanding, and promoting cooperation between Europe, Africa and the rest of the world through education, arts, and cultural exchange.
Footer.newsLetterP: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates, events, and opportunities.
